name: Marble Battles - Multiplayer Battles
description:
Remember those times you played marbles with your friends? Relive those moments again, except this time, with EXPLOSIONS!

Marble Battles is a turn based puzzler-slash-arcade game. Test your skills against players all around the world! Gather gold from your wins and improve your arsenal with various marble features. The more you win, the higher your rating will go!

FEATURES:

- Online play with players all around the world
- Duels with friends
- Multiple marble types
- Flashy marble trails
- Multiple levels
- Player rankings, strive to be the best!


This game requires a network connection.

Drop in the forums for any help!
http://forum.marblebattles.com/
